abstract: The automaker also told dealers to tell potential buyers about defective airbags.
snippet: The automaker also told dealers to tell potential buyers about defective airbags.
lead_paragraph: Toyota said on Friday that it had instructed its dealers to disclose which of its new cars still use airbags that may deteriorate over time and become prone to violent ruptures. And the automaker said it had instructed dealers to tell potential buyers about the issue.

headline.main: Toyota Names Vehicles That Still Have Faulty Airbags
headline.print_headline: Toyota Dealers to Disclose Faulty Airbags in New Cars
